named-native-query.name: getMissingLoadPartIds
named-native-query.query: select plt.lego_id as id from LEGO_PART_LOAD_TABLE plt join LEGO_PART_LOAD_NUMBER_TABLE plnt on plnt.lego_part_id = plt.lego_id and plnt.lego_type = 'MAIN' join LEGO_PART_NUMBER pn on pn.lego_number = plnt.lego_number where ( select count(1) from LEGO_PART_LOAD_NUMBER_TABLE plnt1 join LEGO_PART_COLOR_NUMBER pcn on pcn.lego_number = plnt1.lego_number join LEGO_PART_COLOR pc on pc.lego_id = pcn.lego_part_color_id where plnt1.lego_part_id = plt.lego_id and plnt1.lego_type = 'COLOR' and pc.lego_part_id = pn.lego_part_id ) <> ( select count(1) from LEGO_PART_LOAD_NUMBER_TABLE plnt1 where plnt1.lego_part_id = plt.lego_id and plnt1.lego_type = 'COLOR' )
